thread.title: Justices mull appeal of Chicago suburb's assault weapons ban
thread.title_full: Justices mull appeal of Chicago suburb's assault weapons ban - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Mark Sherman, Associated Press
title: Justices mull appeal of Chicago suburb's assault weapons ban
text: Photo: Jacquelyn Martin, AP This Oct. 13, 2015, photo shows the Supreme Court in Washington. The Supreme Court has so far resisted elaborating on two landmark decisions that established a nationwide right to defend one's home with a gun. That could change with a new appeal filed by gun owners that challenges a Chicago suburb's assault weapons ban. This Oct. 13, 2015, photo shows the Supreme Court in Washington.... WASHINGTON (AP) — The Supreme Court has so far resisted elaborating on two landmark decisions that established a nationwide right to defend one's home with a gun. This Oct. 13, 2015, photo shows the Supreme Court in Washington. That could change with a new appeal filed by gun owners that challenges a Chicago suburb's assault weapons ban. This Oct. 13, 2015, photo shows the Supreme Court in Washington....
